short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Suggests replies for LinkedIn posts using ChatGPT API

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LinkedIn ReplySensei is an AI powered Chrome extension that suggests replies for LinkedIn posts using the ChatGPT API. This extension adds a "Suggest Reply" button to each LinkedIn post's reply input field, allowing users to generate a suggested reply with a single click.
